name: py-fire

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Python Fire is a library for automatically generating command line
interfaces (CLIs) with a single line of code.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-termcolor
dependencies.description: ANSII Color formatting for output in terminal.

dependent_to.name: py-keras2onnx
dependent_to.description: Converts Machine Learning models to ONNX for use in Windows ML

dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm
dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.

dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-eval
dependent_to.description:
An automatic evaluator for instruction-following language models. Human-
validated, high-quality, cheap, and fast.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-utilities
dependent_to.description: Common Python utilities and GitHub Actions in Lightning Ecosystem

dependent_to.name: py-xanadu-cloud-client
dependent_to.description:
The Xanadu Cloud Client (XCC) is a Python API and CLI for the Xanadu
Cloud.
